comments:
error occur when map attached java class to dynamic text item
Build number:
2.1.2.v20061122-0710
Steps to reproduce:
1. create a text data
2. create a data source
    (jdbc:oracle:thin:@spmdb:1521:test)
3. create a data set using the data source
    (query: select * from orders)
4. bind the text data to the data set
5. map it to attached java class
6. preview the report
Expected result:
no eeror occur
Actual result:
error occur
